events.name: New York Rangers at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Artemi Panarin had a goal and two assists, and the New York Rangers beat the Detroit Red Wings 4-1 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Panarin has goal, 2 assists as Rangers beat Red Wings 4-1

events.name: Minnesota Wild at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Kirill Kaprizov had a goal and an assist, and the Minnesota Wild beat the New York Islanders 5-2 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kaprizov has goal and assist as Wild beat Islanders 5-2 for 3rd win in 4 games

headlines.description: — Connor Bedard had a goal and three assists, Spencer Knight stopped 33 shots for his first shutout of the season, and the Chicago Blackhawks beat the Calgary Flames 4-0 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bedard has a goal and 3 assists, Knight gets 6th career shutout as Blackhawks beat Flames 4-0

events.name: Winnipeg Jets at San Jose Sharks

headlines.description: — Will Smith scored the tiebreaking goal late in the third period, and the San Jose Sharks beat the Winnipeg Jets 2-1 on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Will Smith scores tiebreaking goal late in 3rd period as Sharks beat Jets 2-1
